articles.title: Need a lift? SpaceX launches record spacecraft in cosmic rideshare program - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: The Falcon 9 rocket lifted off at 10 a.m. EST from the Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida. It flew south along the eastern coast of Florida on its way to space, the company said.
